text: 1. Max is already planning matching Halloween costumes for the kids. It’s very cute! 2. The most stunning strawberry cheesecake I ever did see. 3. I absolutely love Megan’s megazine! Her branding and photos are incredible. 4. I just finished Broken Country and oh my gosh – I can’t stop thinking about it. Book hangover! What are you reading? 5. Are we going to burn out on pistachio? Never. 6. TV things! Finished The Bear and ah! So good. Oh and I’m still chugging along with And Just Like That. Ugh. 7. We went to see the new Jurassic Park movie and it was pretty good – I mean, loud, crazy and had some jump scares but the newer cast was good! 8. Tricks to make yourself feel happier! 9. All my amazon prime day picks (only what I have and use/love!) are here! I also shared my fave target sale picks here too.
html:
1. Max is already planning matching Halloween costumes for the kids. It’s very cute!

2. The most stunning strawberry cheesecake I ever did see.

3. I absolutely love Megan’s megazine! Her branding and photos are incredible.

4. I just finished Broken Country and oh my gosh – I can’t stop thinking about it. Book hangover! What are you reading?

5. Are we going to burn out on pistachio? Never.

6. TV things! Finished The Bear and ah! So good. Oh and I’m still chugging along with And Just Like That. Ugh.

7. We went to see the new Jurassic Park movie and it was pretty good – I mean, loud, crazy and had some jump scares but the newer cast was good!

8. Tricks to make yourself feel happier!

9. All my amazon prime day picks (only what I have and use/love!) are here! I also shared my fave target sale picks here too.
